messages.text:
Topic	A short nature documentary exploring the serene beauty of a forest ecosystem, highlighting wildlife and natural wonders.
Audience	General viewers interested in nature and relaxation.
Music Theme	Calm and ambient, with soft instrumental sounds evoking tranquility in nature.
Video Length	Roughly 15 seconds (short-form documentary clip).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, including a narrated overview of forest life with engaging descriptions.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	A friendly middle-aged male avatar with an adventurous, nature-loving appearance (e.g., wearing outdoor attire).
Voice	Adult male voice with a warm, neutral American accent.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of lush forests, animals, and natural scenery to complement the narration.
Captions	Enabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

Of course. I've updated the plan to include a female avatar.

No problem. I have changed the plan back to feature a male avatar.
